author: John D. McKinnon
title: As Zuckerberg Prepares to Testify, Questions Grow Over How to Protect Data
text:
When Facebook Inc. Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg testifies in Congress this week, the companyâ€™s data-privacy troubles are likely to prompt a raft of questions over how the government should regulate social-media platforms.
So, what might such regulation look like?
